snippet.title: BURGGEIST - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2203210

With the walking fortress Burggeist at your command, fight back the enemies and build "the Tower."

Platform: PC - Windows(Steam)
Release date: October 14, 2024(PDT)
Genre: Action/Strategy
Player: 1
Language: English/Japanese
Publisher/Developer: GHRIAN STUDIO

BURGGEIST OFFICIAL SITE
https://www.burggeist.info/
